description: This simple warm salad has middle eastern flavours which work perfectly with sweet carrots and creamy goats cheese.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Roasted Carrot, Coriander & Goats Cheese Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g carrots, peeled and sliced into quarters

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C. Add the carrots to a roasting tin, drizzle with a tablespoon of oil and sprinkle over the spices. Toss well and roast for 20 minutes. Drizzle over the honey and roast for 5 more minutes.
Toss the leaves in a large bowl with lemon juice, the rest of the oil, coriander leaves and pumpkin seeds. Add the carrots and toss to combine.
Serve with goats cheese crumbled on top.
